column4: Hey, for some reason ubuntu won't read my 8gb micro sd card through my card reader. 1 and 2 work fine.
I'd be guessing a hardware limitation. do you know if it works under windows on the same hardware?
I don't, unfortunately. I may be able to share it in vbox, but if i can't i won't know if it's because the hardware won't read it or because ubuntu won't.
oh nevermind, I can't. my image is on my external, which is in the car.
